nodes.text: The Meram Sector was a sector located in the galaxy. After the Captain Lindon Javes betrayed his squadron in a battle at Fostar Haven, the Galactic Empire reassigned Lieutenant Terisa Kerrill in "disgrace" to the Meram Sector to protect fuel shipments from petty scoundrels and pirates, the sort of posting that used to end careers.

Meram Sector was first mentioned in Star Wars Canon in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons. The Meram sector was first mentioned in Star Wars Legends, in the 1994 Galaxy Guide 11: Criminal Organizations.
